articles.title: Italy's coronavirus death toll overtakes Britain's | News - The Times
articles.description: Italy has overtaken the UK as the worst European country for Covid-19 deaths, as its government faces intensifying criticism over its “amateurish” policies aimed at preventing a crippling second wave
